arts.ttl: How Newcastle's freedom of play blew Forest away
arts.sum: Match of the Day 2 pundits Mark Chapman, Troy Deeney and Joe Hart analyse Newcastle United's performance against Nottingham Forest in their 4-3 Premier League win.

arts.ttl: 'What he's done is amazing' - Isak reaches landmark to join elite list
arts.sum: Newcastle United striker Alexander Isak becomes the seventh-fastest player to reach 50 Premier League goals.

arts.ttl: Newcastle Want to Sign 'Absolute Sensation' Forward for Howe
arts.sum: Newcastle are reportedly targeting a move for Marseille winger Luis Henrique for Eddie Howe.

arts.sum: Newcastle prevailed over Nottingham Forest as Alexander Isak, Lewis Miley and Jacob Murphy all got on the scoresheet at St James' Park to narrow th gap to the Premier League's top four

arts.ttl: Report: Juventus ramp up efforts to sign Newcastle midfielder with 31 appearances this season
arts.sum: Juventus is ramping up its efforts to bring Sandro Tonali back to Serie A, particularly after their disappointing exit from the Champions League. The Old Lady were knocked out of the competition following a defeat to PSV Eindhoven. However, landing fourth spot is within reach for the club, thereby qualifying for next seasonâ€™s Champions League. arts.ttl: Worldâ€™s richest football club owners and where Newcastle United rank
arts.sum: The Saudi Arabia-backed Public Investment Fund (PIF) completed takeover of the club from previous owner Mike Ashley for a fee of around Â£300 million. The takeover saw PIF become by far the richest owners of a club in worldwide football.

arts.ttl: Nottingham Forest fans all saying one player had his â€˜worstâ€™ ever game against Newcastle United
Alan Shearer's one-word response sums up Newcastle United after nervy Nottingham Forest finish
arts.sum: This was an extremely different reaction from the Premier League's all-time top goalscorer after the more comfortable scoreline at the end of the first half. Alan Shearer was a relieved man after Newcastle United just about managed to stave off a late fightback from Nottingham Forest at St. James' Park on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Newcastle boss Eddie Howe: I love management â€“ but I hate it at the same time
arts.sum: The Magpies led 4-1 before Nottingham Forest mounted a second-half fightback.
